note: These practice questions are interspersed within the tutorial slides for immediate practice.

questions.questionText: Based on the sales table (Jan: A-50, B-30, C-40 | Feb: A-60, B-35, C-45 | Mar: A-55, B-40, C-50), what is the total sales of Product A for all three months?
questions.explanation: Product A sales: January (50) + February (60) + March (55) = 165 thousand ₹.

questions.questionText: A pie chart shows family expenditure. If food expenditure is represented by 120°, what percentage of total expenditure is on food?
A line graph shows temperature: Mon-20°C, Tue-22°C, Wed-25°C, Thu-23°C, Fri-26°C. What is the average temperature?
A company's revenue was ₹80,000 in 2022 and ₹1,00,000 in 2023. What is the percentage increase?
